#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,m,n,num,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        vector<int> v(n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&(v[i]));
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        printf("%d\n",v[n-m]);
    }
    return 0;
}
